Question: What are the names and ages of individuals who both own a vehicle registered after 2015 and are involved in crimes of type 'Burglary'?
Cypher:
MATCH (person:Person)-[partyTo:PARTY_TO]->(crime:Crime), (vehicle:Vehicle)-[involvedIn:INVOLVED_IN]->(crime)
WHERE vehicle.year > 2015 AND crime.type = "Burglary"
RETURN person, partyTo, crime, involvedIn, vehicle, person.name, person.age
Rewrite: Can you provide the names and ages of people who own a vehicle registered post-2015 and are implicated in Burglary crimes?

Question: List the email addresses and phone numbers of people who are family of 'John Doe' and have reported crimes in the 'Downtown' area.
Cypher:
MATCH (johnDoe:Person {name:"John", surname:"Doe"})-[:FAMILY_REL]->(familyMember:Person),
      (familyMember)-[:PARTY_TO]->(crime:Crime)-[:OCCURRED_AT]->(crimeLocation:Location)-[:LOCATION_IN_AREA]->(area:Area {areaCode:"Downtown"}),
      (familyMember)-[:HAS_EMAIL]->(email:Email),
      (familyMember)-[:HAS_PHONE]->(phone:Phone)
RETURN johnDoe, familyMember, crime, crimeLocation, area, email, phone, email.email_address, phone.phoneNo
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (johnDoe:Person {name:"John", surname:"Doe"})-[relation7:FAMILY_REL]->(familyMember:Person),
      (familyMember)-[relation8:PARTY_TO]->(crime:Crime)-[relation9:OCCURRED_AT]->(crimeLocation:Location)-[relation10:LOCATION_IN_AREA]->(area:Area {areaCode:"Downtown"}),
      (familyMember)-[relation11:HAS_EMAIL]->(email:Email),
      (familyMember)-[relation12:HAS_PHONE]->(phone:Phone)
RETURN relation12, relation11, relation10, relation9, relation8, relation7, johnDoe, familyMember, crime, crimeLocation, area, email, phone, email.email_address, phone.phoneNo
Semantic-EQL-Question: Who are the family members of John Doe connected to crimes in the Downtown area, and how can they be contacted via email or phone?
Rewrite: Provide the email addresses and phone numbers of relatives of 'John Doe' who have reported criminal activities in the 'Downtown' region.

Question: Identify the make and model of vehicles involved in crimes investigated by officers with the rank of 'Sergeant' and where the last outcome was 'Charged'.
Cypher:
MATCH (vehicle:Vehicle)-[involved:INVOLVED_IN]->(crime:Crime), (officer:Officer)-[investigates:INVESTIGATED_BY]->(crime)
WHERE officer.rank="Sergeant" AND crime.last_outcome="Charged"
RETURN vehicle, involved, crime, officer, investigates, vehicle.make, vehicle.model
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (vehicle:Vehicle)-[involved:INVOLVED_IN]->(crime:Crime), (officer:Officer)-[investigates:INVESTIGATED_BY]-(crime)
WHERE officer.rank="Sergeant" AND crime.last_outcome="Charged"
RETURN vehicle, involved, crime, officer, investigates, vehicle.make, vehicle.model
Rewrite: Determine the brand and type of vehicles used in crimes that were probed by sergeants and resulted in a final status of 'Charged'.

Question: Provide the badge numbers and ranks of officers who investigated crimes involving red vehicles registered in 2019.
Cypher:
MATCH (vehicle:Vehicle {year:2019})-[involved:INVOLVED_IN]->(crime:Crime), (officer:Officer)-[investigates:INVESTIGATED_BY]->(crime)
WHERE vehicle.make = "red"
RETURN vehicle, involved, crime, officer, investigates, officer.badge_no, officer.rank
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (vehicle:Vehicle {year:2019})-[involved:INVOLVED_IN]->(crime:Crime), (officer:Officer)-[investigates:INVESTIGATED_BY]-(crime)
WHERE vehicle.make = "red"
RETURN vehicle, involved, crime, officer, investigates, officer.badge_no, officer.rank
Rewrite: Supply the badge numbers and ranks of the officers who conducted investigations into crimes related to red vehicles registered in 2019.

Question: Determine the names and email addresses of individuals who live in the 'EH11' postcode and who have made phone calls longer than 5 minutes on the date '2021-05-15'.
Cypher:
MATCH (person:Person)-[currentAddressRel:CURRENT_ADDRESS]->(location:Location)-[hasPostcodeRel:HAS_POSTCODE]->(postcode:PostCode {code:"EH11"}),
      (person)-[hasPhoneRel:HAS_PHONE]->(phone:Phone)-[phoneCallRel:CALLED]->(phoneCall:PhoneCall {call_date:date("2021-05-15"), call_duration: duration({minutes: 5})}),
      (person)-[hasEmailRel:HAS_EMAIL]->(email:Email)
RETURN person, currentAddressRel, location, hasPostcodeRel, postcode, hasPhoneRel, phone, phoneCallRel, phoneCall, hasEmailRel, email, person.name, email.email_address
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (person:Person)-[currentAddressRel:CURRENT_ADDRESS]->(location:Location)-[hasPostcodeRel:HAS_POSTCODE]->(postcode:PostCode {code:"EH11"}),
      (person)-[hasPhoneRel:HAS_PHONE]->(phone:Phone)-[phoneCallRel:CALLED]-(phoneCall:PhoneCall {call_date:date("2021-05-15"), call_duration: duration({minutes: 5})}),
      (person)-[hasEmailRel:HAS_EMAIL]->(email:Email)
RETURN person, currentAddressRel, location, hasPostcodeRel, postcode, hasPhoneRel, phone, phoneCallRel, phoneCall, hasEmailRel, email, person.name, email.email_address
Rewrite: Identify the names and email addresses of people residing in the 'EH11' postcode who have engaged in phone calls exceeding 5 minutes on '2021-05-15'.

Question: Who are the persons residing in the location with postcode 'AB12', and what is the type and description of the objects they own?
Cypher:
MATCH (person:Person)-[currentAddrRel:CURRENT_ADDRESS]->(location:Location)-[hasPostcodeRel:HAS_POSTCODE]->(postcode:PostCode {code:"AB12"})
RETURN person, currentAddrRel, location, hasPostcodeRel, postcode, person.name, person.surname, person.age
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (person:Person)-[current_address:CURRENT_ADDRESS]->(location:Location)-[has_postcode:HAS_POSTCODE]->(postcode:PostCode {code:"AB12"}), (person)-[relation6:OWNS]->(object:Object)
RETURN relation6, person, current_address, location, has_postcode, postcode, object, object.type, object.description
Rewrite: Who resides at the location with the postcode 'AB12', and what are the types and descriptions of the possessions they own?

Question: What is the type of relationship between 'Sarah Connor' and other individuals she knows, who have also been parties to a crime in the last year?
Cypher:
MATCH (sarah:Person {name:"Sarah", surname:"Connor"})-[relType]->(knownPerson:Person)-[party:PARTY_TO]->(relatedCrime:Crime)
WHERE relatedCrime.date >= date({year:date().year - 1})
RETURN sarah, relType, knownPerson, party, relatedCrime, relType.rel_type

Question: Can you describe the familial relationships between persons who have shared phone calls with duration over 10 minutes?
Cypher:
MATCH (callerPerson:Person)-[:HAS_PHONE]->(callerPhone:Phone)<-[:CALLER]-(phoneCall:PhoneCall)-[:CALLED]->(receiverPhone:Phone)<-[:HAS_PHONE]-(receiverPerson:Person)
MATCH (callerPerson)-[familyRel:FAMILY_REL]->(receiverPerson)
WHERE phoneCall.call_duration > 10
RETURN callerPerson, receiverPerson, phoneCall, familyRel, familyRel.rel_type
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (callerPerson:Person)-[relation5:HAS_PHONE]->(callerPhone:Phone)<-[relation6:CALLER]-(phoneCall:PhoneCall)-[relation7:CALLED]->(receiverPhone:Phone)<-[relation8:HAS_PHONE]-(receiverPerson:Person)
MATCH (callerPerson)-[familyRel:FAMILY_REL]->(receiverPerson)
WHERE phoneCall.call_duration > 10
RETURN relation8, relation7, relation6, relation5, receiverPhone, callerPhone, callerPerson, receiverPerson, phoneCall, familyRel, familyRel.rel_type
Rewrite: Can you explain the family connections among individuals who have engaged in phone conversations lasting more than 10 minutes?

Question: What are the relationships and roles of people in crimes that occurred at locations within the 'Westside' area?
Cypher:
MATCH (area:Area {areaCode:"Westside"})<-[inArea:LOCATION_IN_AREA]-(location:Location)<-[occurred:OCCURRED_AT]-(crime:Crime),
      (person:Person)-[partyTo:PARTY_TO]->(crime)
RETURN area, inArea, location, occurred, crime, person, partyTo
Rewrite: What are the roles and connections of individuals involved in criminal activities in places located in the 'Westside' region?

Question: Identify the call types involving people who reside at '123 Maple Street' and the phone numbers of their callers.
Cypher:
MATCH (residentLocation:Location {address:"123 Maple Street"})<-[currentAddressRel:CURRENT_ADDRESS]-(person:Person)-[hasPhoneRel:HAS_PHONE]->(phone:Phone)

RETURN residentLocation, currentAddressRel, person, hasPhoneRel, phone, phoneCall, calledRel, phoneCall.call_type, phone.phoneNo
Rewrite: Determine the types of calls made to individuals living at '123 Maple Street' and the phone numbers of the callers.

Question: Detail the types of connections between multiple offenders who have been involved in 'Fraud' type crimes and their respective investigating officers.
Cypher:
MATCH (offender:Person)-[partyTo:PARTY_TO]->(fraudCrime:Crime {type:"Fraud"}), (fraudCrime)-[investigatedBy:INVESTIGATED_BY]->(officer:Officer)

Question: What are the relational links between crimes involving stolen vehicles and the officers investigating these crimes?

Question: What is the average age of individuals who own at least two vehicles and have been accused of felonies in 'Sector 4'?
Cypher:
MATCH (person:Person)-[:HAS_PHONE]->(phone:Phone),
      (person)-[:PARTY_TO]->(crime:Crime)-[:OCCURRED_AT]->(location:Location)-[:LOCATION_IN_AREA]->(area:Area {areaCode: "Sector 4"}),
      (person)-[:CURRENT_ADDRESS]->(current_location:Location)-[:HAS_POSTCODE]->(postcode:PostCode)-[:POSTCODE_IN_AREA]->(current_area:Area)
WHERE crime.type = "Felony" AND current_area.areaCode = "Sector 4"
WITH person, COLLECT(DISTINCT phone) AS phones
WHERE SIZE(phones) >= 2
RETURN AVG(person.age)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (person:Person)-[relation8:HAS_PHONE]->(phone:Phone),
      (person)-[relation9:PARTY_TO]->(crime:Crime)-[relation10:OCCURRED_AT]->(location:Location)-[relation11:LOCATION_IN_AREA]->(area:Area {areaCode: "Sector 4"}),
      (person)-[relation12:CURRENT_ADDRESS]->(current_location:Location)-[relation13:HAS_POSTCODE]->(postcode:PostCode)-[relation14:POSTCODE_IN_AREA]->(current_area:Area)
WHERE crime.type = "Felony" AND current_area.areaCode = "Sector 4"
WITH person, COLLECT(DISTINCT phone) AS phones
WHERE SIZE(phones) >= 2
RETURN AVG(person.age)
Semantic-EQL-Question: What is the average age of persons living in Sector 4 with multiple phone connections who have been implicated in felonies within Sector 4?
Rewrite: What is the mean age of people who possess a minimum of two cars and face felony charges in 'Sector 4'?

Question: Calculate the average call duration involving individuals over the age of 50 who are suspects in ongoing investigation cases.
Cypher:
MATCH (suspect:Person)-[:PARTY_TO]->(crime:Crime)
WHERE suspect.age > 50 AND crime.last_outcome = "ongoing investigation"
MATCH (suspect)-[:HAS_PHONE]->(phone:Phone)<-[:CALLED]-(phone_call:PhoneCall)
RETURN AVG(phone_call.call_duration)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (suspect:Person)-[relation4:PARTY_TO]->(crime:Crime)
WHERE suspect.age > 50 AND crime.last_outcome = "ongoing investigation"
MATCH (suspect)-[relation5:HAS_PHONE]->(phone:Phone)<-[relation6:CALLED]-(phone_call:PhoneCall)
RETURN AVG(phone_call.call_duration)
Rewrite: Compute the mean duration of calls that include people older than 50 who are suspects in active investigations.

Question: What is the maximum number of crime types associated with individuals living in the 'Greenfield' area code, and involved in driving offences?
Cypher:
MATCH (area:Area {areaCode: "Greenfield"})<-[:POSTCODE_IN_AREA]-(postcode:PostCode)<-[:HAS_POSTCODE]-(location:Location)<-[:CURRENT_ADDRESS]-(person:Person)-[:PARTY_TO]->(crime:Crime)
WHERE crime.type CONTAINS "driving offence"
RETURN crime.type, COUNT(*) AS Count
ORDER BY Count DESC
LIMIT 1
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (area:Area {areaCode: "Greenfield"})<-[relation5:POSTCODE_IN_AREA]-(postcode:PostCode)<-[relation6:HAS_POSTCODE]-(location:Location)<-[relation7:CURRENT_ADDRESS]-(person:Person)-[relation8:PARTY_TO]->(crime:Crime)
WHERE crime.type CONTAINS "driving offence"
RETURN crime.type, COUNT(*) AS Count
ORDER BY Count DESC
LIMIT 1
Rewrite: What is the highest count of different crime categories linked to people from the 'Greenfield' area code who are implicated in driving offenses?

Question: Determine the minimum and maximum year of vehicles involved in hit-and-run incidents in the 'Northview' area.
Cypher:
MATCH (vehicle:Vehicle)-[:INVOLVED_IN]->(crime:Crime {type:"hit-and-run"})
MATCH (crime)-[:OCCURRED_AT]->(location:Location)-[:LOCATION_IN_AREA]->(area:Area {areaCode:"Northview"})
RETURN MIN(vehicle.year) AS MinYear, MAX(vehicle.year) AS MaxYear
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (vehicle:Vehicle)-[relation4:INVOLVED_IN]->(crime:Crime {type:"hit-and-run"})
MATCH (crime)-[relation5:OCCURRED_AT]->(location:Location)-[relation6:LOCATION_IN_AREA]->(area:Area {areaCode:"Northview"})
RETURN MIN(vehicle.year) AS MinYear, MAX(vehicle.year) AS MaxYear
Rewrite: Identify the earliest and latest model years of vehicles implicated in hit-and-run accidents in the 'Northview' region.

Question: How many different types of familial relationships exist among individuals living in the same postcode and connected to more than three crimes?
Cypher:
MATCH (person1:Person)-[family_rel:FAMILY_REL]->(person2:Person)
WHERE family_rel.rel_type IN ['Parent', 'Child', 'Sibling', 'Spouse']
MATCH (person1)-[:CURRENT_ADDRESS]->(loc1:Location)-[:HAS_POSTCODE]->(postcode1:PostCode),
      (person2)-[:CURRENT_ADDRESS]->(loc2:Location)-[:HAS_POSTCODE]->(postcode2:PostCode)
WHERE postcode1 = postcode2
WITH person1, person2, family_rel.rel_type AS FamilyType
MATCH (person1)-[:PARTY_TO]->(crime:Crime)
WITH person1, person2, FamilyType, COUNT(DISTINCT crime) AS NumCrimes
WHERE NumCrimes > 3
RETURN DISTINCT FamilyType
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (person1:Person)-[family_rel:FAMILY_REL]->(person2:Person)
WHERE family_rel.rel_type IN ['Parent', 'Child', 'Sibling', 'Spouse']
MATCH (person1)-[relation8:CURRENT_ADDRESS]->(loc1:Location)-[relation11:HAS_POSTCODE]->(postcode1:PostCode),
      (person2)-[relation9:CURRENT_ADDRESS]->(loc2:Location)-[:HAS_POSTCODE]->(postcode2:PostCode)
WHERE postcode1 = postcode2
WITH person1, person2, family_rel.rel_type AS FamilyType
MATCH (person1)-[relation12:PARTY_TO]->(crime:Crime)
WITH person1, person2, FamilyType, COUNT(DISTINCT crime) AS NumCrimes
WHERE NumCrimes > 3
RETURN DISTINCT FamilyType
Semantic-EQL-Question: What types of family relationships exist between individuals who share the same postcode and have at least one member involved in more than three criminal activities?
Rewrite: How many varied familial connections are there among people residing in the same postal code who are linked to over three criminal activities?

Question: Count the number of crimes that both occurred in locations inside 'Area 99' and involved blue vehicles with registrations predating 2010.
Cypher:
MATCH (vehicle:Vehicle)-[involved:INVOLVED_IN]->(crime:Crime)-[occurred:OCCURRED_AT]->(location:Location)-[location_in_area:LOCATION_IN_AREA]->(area:Area)
WHERE area.areaCode = '99' AND vehicle.make = 'blue' AND vehicle.year < 2010
RETURN COUNT(crime)
Rewrite: Calculate how many incidents involved blue vehicles registered before 2010 and took place within 'Area 99'.
